name: KingCamp Folding Camping Cot for Adults,Portable Sturdy Sleeping Cot with Carry Bag Outdoor Lightweight Camping Bed Support 264 lbs,Large Outdoor Foldable Travel Cots for Camping Beach Home Nap
short_description: Folding camping cot is ideal for sleeping at the campground, cabin, or at home, accommodating individuals under 6 feet and 2 inches and supporting up to 264 pounds
Constructed from heavy-duty carbon steel tube bracket with a symmetrical triangular structure, ten-point ground support design, and anti-slip feet that provide even weight distribution and stability
Made up of durable thick, double-layer 1000D Oxford polyester that is breathable and waterproof; Tilt angle design and built-in cotton pad provide comfort and minimize back, neck, or shoulder pain
Folds into a compact size that fits nicely in the included carrying bag and in most car trunks; Features a multi-layer side pocket that provides convenient storage for your essentials
Open dimensions measure 74 inches long, 26 inches wide, and 18.9 inches tall, while when folded, it measures 6 inches long, 9 inches wide, and 41 inches tall and weighs just 12.5 pounds

name: MARCHWAY Lightweight Folding Tent Camping Cot Bed with Lever Lock, Easy Setup Portable Compact for Outdoor Travel, Hunting, Hiking, Motorcycling, Support 330Lbs (Army Green)
short_description: Steady and Heavy Duty: Thick high strength aircraft-grade aluminum frame and tear resistant nylon fabric enable the cot to support up to 330lbs. Wide plastic brackets on the rod keep the cot stable without wobbling even on unlevel ground. 8 anti-skid feet provide firm grip and evenly distribute weight.

Easy Setup and Take Down: The structure of connecting rods with internal bungee cord makes it easy to fold. The innovative lever lock mechanism saves time and effort in assembly. You can prop up the cot just by gently pressing the rod down, the whole assembly takes only a few minutes.

Ultralight and Compact: Weighs 6.5 lbs and folds down to 17x 7x 6 inch carry bag that fits in a suitcase or on the shoulder. You can take it on your trip anytime and anywhere. Ideal for overnight car camper, motorcyclist, trekker, hiker, hunter, adventurer.

Superior Comfort: Length and width are optimal for most adults. Your shoulders, back and legs can be well supported. Lever lock structure stretches the fabric to keep it taut without sagging. Thick fabric makes cot quiet even if you turn around while sleeping. 8-inch height keeps you away from the cold on the ground while giving you enough headroom in the tent.

Versatility: Convenient for overnight moto car camping, kayaking, fishing, scouting, field exercise, back country backpacking, music festival, also ideal for guests visiting at home, taking a nap at the office. This foldable lightweight camping bed is an essential choice for anyone looking for light travel without the bulk.

name: TIMBER RIDGE Lightweight Aluminum Camping Cot, 20-Second Quick Set-Up Folding Cot with Zipper Closure, Portable Carry Bag Included for Camping, Travel and Outdoors, Support up to 225lbs, Blue
short_description: NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Designed with all-in-one sturdy frame, all parts are pre-attached and already in place, just pull a single zipper to set up this camping cots for adults within 20s. It is a breeze to set up.

LIGHTWEIGHT & HEAVY DUTY: This folding cot is made with 20mm*10mm aluminum pipes, only weights 6.6lbs. U-shape sturdy structure to distribute the weight well and prevents poking through the tent floor, supports up to 225lbs. (The maximum weight of our cot is 225 pounds, so sorry that some products TAG marked wrong)

COMFORTABLE & PORTABLE: Open size 75"Lx26"Wx6"H is optimal for most people, soft and wearproof fabric make this camp cot fairly comfortable to use. Quite compact with a folded size 19"Lx 9"Wx6"H, come with a carry bag for easy transport and storage.

LOW CAMPING COT: This cot sits 6“ off the ground. You can put your shoes at the end of the cot and also place items at the head of the cot or under the cot for ready access, and you can easily find flashlights and other items even in the dark.

BELIEVE US: At TIMBER RIDGE, each product is meticulously crafted with care and supported by our dedication to ensuring customer contentment. Should any concerns arise, our assistance is readily available.

Separate Use: This all-in-1 camping cot tent can be used together, or you can only use the detachable cot, mattress, or sleeping bag separately as you need. The elevated tent with zipper mesh can keep you dry and warm from wet ground.
